attributes.action: Close schools colleges and universities in the month long lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Keep our kids safe! Them continuing with school does not stop the spread of
Covid or reduce it! They still risk the spread, vulnerable people are still at risk in homes and our children’s health becomes a big risk too. Why don’t they could in any of this
attributes.background: Stop the spread in schools, colleges and universities since going back in September the cases have been rising fast with in those environments our children need protection too. It’s a short lockdown so won’t be detrimental to there mental health and having a healthy child is so important
